MS MCQs

    Create and manage teams and channels with Microsoft Teams

    »

    1. Which of the following is NOT a way to create a team?

      From scratch.

      From a template.

      From a tab.


    2. Which team role can accept or deny membership requests?

      Owner.

      Member.

      Guest.


    3. What type of channel does every team get by default?

      Tasks.

      Wiki.

      General.


    4. What are the ways to use the command box?

      Search, slash commands and @ command.

      Search, @ command and tabs.

      Search, slash commands and messages.
